name: landscapist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an artist who paints, draws, or photographs landscapes (= pictures of the countryside): Ansel Adams was one of the greatest of American landscapists. The show includes several scenes by the Dutch landscapist Jacob van Ruisdael.
More examplesFewer examplesIt would be difficult to write a history of Russian art without discussing its landscapists.Where Turner was a landscapist of true genius, his contemporary Constable was a moderately talented landscape lightweight. She was herself no mean landscapist and botanical artist.
